metadata.title: OC Worlds & Worldbuilding | AnividAI
metadata.description: Create and explore story worlds for anime OCs. Organize characters, build lore, and share fictional settings.
metadata.keywords: oc worlds, anime worldbuilding, story world, fictional world, character world, oc setting

metadata.title: Create a New World | AnividAI
metadata.description: Start a new world setting and build its core lore.
metadata.keywords: create world, world building tool, oc world

create.title: Forge a New Reality
create.subtitle: Design a unique setting that brings your characters together. From high fantasy to neon-lit cyberpunk, the possibilities are infinite.
create.placeholder: World creation tools are ready for your vision.
create.helper: Start with the basics, expand the lore later.

labels.name: World Name*
labels.allow_join: Allow others to add their OCs

placeholders.name: e.g. Neo-Tokyo, Elysium...
placeholders.description: Tell the story and details of this world...

inhabitants.title: Inhabitants
inhabitants.subtitle: Define the dominant species in your world.

extra_details.title: Extra Details
extra_details.subtitle: Add custom properties to your world.

cover.title: World Cover
cover.subtitle: Set the stage with a beautiful background.

empty.extra_details: Use custom fields for currency, religion, laws, etc.

helpers.allow_join_enabled_hint: Other creators can link their OCs to this world.
helpers.allow_join_disabled_hint: Only you can link OCs to this world.

ocs.title: Related OCs
ocs.subtitle: Show the OCs that belong to this world.
ocs.dialog_subtitle: Choose the characters that should live in this world.

errors.world_limit_reached: World limit reached for your current plan. Upgrade to create more worlds.
errors.form_invalid: Please check the form fields and try again.
errors.cover_generation_missing_fields: Please provide a world name before generating.
errors.cover_generation_unavailable: Image generation model is not available.

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.public_hint: Visible to everyone in the community.

generation_modal.title: Generate World Background
generation_modal.description: Create a stunning visual for your world.

metadata.title: Edit World | AnividAI
metadata.description: Update your world settings and lore.
metadata.keywords: edit world, world settings, oc world

edit.title: Refine Your World
edit.subtitle: Adjust the lore, visuals, and configuration of your world.

errors.form_invalid: Please check the form fields and try again.
errors.cover_generation_missing_fields: Please provide a world name before generating.
errors.cover_generation_unavailable: Image generation model is not available.

metadata.title: Explore World | AnividAI
metadata.description: Discover the lore and characters of this unique setting.

detail.title: World Overview
detail.subtitle: Dive into the depths of this unique setting.
detail.note: Explore the lore, visualize the environment, and meet the characters who inhabit this world.

list.title: Explore OC Worlds
list.subtitle: Anime OC worldbuilding hub
list.empty_description: Be the first to build a story world for your OCs.

card.description_fallback: No description provided for this world.
